name: Duty Truck Cargo Mountain
description:
Duty Truck Cargo Mountain is very dangerous and adventurous as well in the long driving game all new transport. Feel the real thrill driving heavy duty truck drive game because it contains a lot of cargo truck with different and amazing tasks
Features
• Challenging off-road truck drive.
• Real mountain HD graphics.
• Mission based challenging game.
• Performance metrics of mountain driver.
• Very smooth controls and realistic truck physics.
